text: Need Chloe Lewis for Chemist Warehouse campaign. Budget around $34,286, looking for 2 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x TikTok video, 3 x Twitter post, 3 x Instagram reel, 2 x 3-minute vlog. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
